yuiNavSteps.flpCredentialsDesc: Enter credentials for your adaptation project's system ({{- system}})

prompts.systemTooltip: Select a system to load its application list
prompts.usernameLabel: Enter the user name for the backend system
prompts.passwordLabel: Enter the password for the backend system
prompts.applicationListTooltip: Select the application for which you want to create an app variant

error.fetchingManifest: Error fetching merged manifest for base application
error.destinationNotInSubaccount: Destination not found in the subaccount: {{- destination}}

error.updatingApp: Error creating a new Adaptation Project. Inspect the logs for full error.
